typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderDate as date,
		ShipDate as date,
		TotalCost as decimal(10,0),
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> OrdersNew
source(output(
		OrderDetailID as string,
		OrderID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitCost as decimal(10,0),
		LineNumber as integer,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> OrderDetailsNew
OrdersNew, OrderDetailsNew join(OrdersNew@OrderID == OrderDetailsNew@OrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Join1 derive(SourceSystemID = toInteger(1)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false) ~> sink1
